The commentary states: Being humble and respectful, shining and low, yet uncrossable is from the Qian hexagram in the Book of Changes, which says: Humility, it will bring good fortune. The gentleman will have a good end.

The elephant says: In the earth there is a mountain, the gentleman uses it to praise many and benefit few, to distribute things equally according to their value.
